Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are talking about the upcoming budget plans and the new incentives aimed at helping small businesses with their energy transformation. They are hopeful and excited about this development. There is also talk of enforcing a 30-day payment policy for suppliers to prevent the delay in the flow of money through the economy. However some people are concerned about the sneaky budgeting approaches of the Morrison Government as they've overlooked numerous programs on the verge of termination. But they are determined to handle things responsibly and methodologically.
